data.name: The Complete Halfquake Trilogy Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Mainly contains songs by muddasheep, and includes guest tracks by TaskBeenden, TheNameless, Vino, LupusRex and Virtual Riot.

Total playtime: 1 hour 55 minutes 35 seconds

The songs will be downloaded into the "soundtrack" subfolder of the game's installation directory.

Complete track list:

halfquake trilogy ost - 01 - muddasheep - halfquake (intro version).mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 02 - muddasheep - triste.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 03 - muddasheep - pestilence.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 04 - muddasheep - hammer blues.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 05 - muddasheep - scream.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 06 - muddasheep - offence.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 07 - muddasheep - absence.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 08 - muddasheep - ambience.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 09 - muddasheep - sapience.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 10 - muddasheep - beautiful gray sea.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 11 - muddasheep - leaving hope academy.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 12 - muddasheep - three thousand years.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 13 - muddasheep - violence.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 14 - muddasheep - somos.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 15 - muddasheep feat. chappi and blackjack - halfquake.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 16 - muddasheep - halfquake (victim remix).mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 17 - muddasheep - halfquake (blueberry hill cover).mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 18 - thenameless - somos (expulsion remix).mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 19 - muddasheep - regretful victim.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 20 - lupusrex - dirty index finger.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 21 - lupusrex - hollow hallways.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 22 - lupusrex feat. muddasheep - wunderground.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 23 - muddasheep - somos version one.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 24 - muddasheep - sunrise.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 25 - muddasheep - cease.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 26 - muddasheep - madvertize.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 27 - muddasheep - it never ends if you want it to.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 28 - muddasheep - dead in your stead.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 29 - taskbeenden - eye of the storm.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 30 - taskbeenden and thenameless - insane migraine.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 31 - thenameless - just for you.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 32 - virtual riot - I wonder.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 33 - vino - clarity.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 34 - thenameless - escapism.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 35 - muddasheep - shining darkly.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 36 - muddasheep - for what it's worth.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 37 - taskbeenden - emperor of death.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 38 - muddasheep - rising son.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 39 - thenameless - pills.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 40 - virtual riot - I am safe.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 41 - virtual riot - even if you cry.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 42 - muddasheep - finally.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 43 - muddasheep - vain attempt.mp3
halfquake trilogy ost - 44 - muddasheep - loading.mp3

data.short_description: 44 songs with a total play time of roughly two hours.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 500 MHz
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB Video Card
  • Storage: 374 MB available space
